citations.desc: Primary enclosures used to transport live animals.
citations.narrative:
The metal enclosure used to transport the porcupine does not have projecting rims or a similar device.
Projecting rims ensure proper ventilation during transportation.
Correct by January 31, 2026, by ensuring the porcupine and all other animals are transported in an enclosure with
projecting rims or similar devices that provide a minimum air circulation space of 0.75 in.
This inspection was conducted at the Bald Eagle Days event at the QCCA Expo Center in Rock Island, IL. The exit
interview was conducted after the inspection with a facility representative.
Additional Inspectors:
Jessica Siegal-Willott n

narrative:
3.137(a) 
   
Primary enclosures used to transport live animals. 
The metal enclosure used to transport the porcupine does not have projecting rims or a similar device. 
 
Projecting rims ensure proper ventilation during transportation.  
 
Correct by January 31, 2026, by ensuring the porcupine and all other animals are transported in an enclosure with 
projecting rims or similar devices that provide a minimum air circulation space of 0.75 in. 
 
This inspection was conducted at the Bald Eagle Days event at the QCCA Expo Center in Rock Island, IL. The exit 
interview was conducted after the inspection with a facility representative. 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
Jessica Siegal-Willott n
